@She__Fi @BoysClubCrypto @developer_dao @wgmicommunity @WGAEast Tally: DAOs are only as good as the sum of their working groups 📈 But what are working groups? And how are the best DAOs implementing them in a successful way? @RikaGoldberg answers all your burning questions and MORE! Read & Collect @viamirror now ⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://tally.mirror.xyz/tGkYuQZUtM2_5YLzXBNn8UwNVonWMZSQUEnDP3Wa6BM

entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens: My latest experiment in the @ArweaveTeam ecosystem is with Execution Machine - @exmbuild ⬢ EXM is a platform that...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens My latest experiment in the @ArweaveTeam ecosystem is with Execution Machine - @exmbuild ⬢ EXM is a platform that enables developers to build + deploy permanent serverless functions on Arweave ⚡️ Today I released an in depth tutorial + codebase here: https://github.com/dabit3/execution-machine
